review_text: I came to this brand - Banyan - a few months ago, as I was taking their Healthy Hair, which has helped me a lot. I Sleep Soundly is also amazing and impressive product. I take it only on evenings when I´m nervous or stressed and it helps me calm down and slow my thoughts  so that I can sleep more deeply and soundly. I like it´s herbal composition. Pure quality as well.
My mom had sleep problems for a while and I tried to find a natural alternative to help her sleep. It made a huge difference. Getting it second time!
This product delivers what it says, sleep soundly! Difficulty to calm down often occurs with a stressful day, and I Sleep Soundly smooths out the emotions for a restful sleep!
Clean and good sleep aid with Ayurvedic herbs! l LOVE THE BRAND BANYAN BOTANICALS. Helps me relax and sleep deep! I love this product! If it wasn't so expensive I would buy it always!
I’ve tried many sleep supplements but this one is my go to! I find it helps to rotate them for effectiveness, but this is the one I take most often.

Actually I like Natural factors betters because even one pill helped me. As for these ones, I take 2 pills as recommended and I can't say I fall asleep immediately but al least I don't wake up throughout the night.
There are lots of good reviews but this did not help me with my sleep. I know it works for lots of people so it is worth trying
I love this brand and maybe wishing to sleep better during menopause is a tall order but this hasn’t helped me at all - yet. I will continue but for me the teas just before bed are better.

The name really fits! I have used many herbal sleep supplements, and Banyan I Sleep Soundly is the best one I have found.  The ingredients are safe; excellent quality. I prefer a sleep supplement that doesn't contain melatonin (so I don't disturb my body's own melatonin production), and this supplement fits that criterion.  Easy-to-take size.
Great sleep after taking this, stopped waking up in the middle of the night

I use this interchangely with lemon balm as a sleep aid (cycle every few months). Quality seems good as I use only 1 pill instead of the recommended dosage (with magnesium glycinate) each night. It's pretty strong herby taste but not overwhelming.

I like the ingredients of this preparation, although it doesn’t always overcome my sleeplessness.   Most of the time I take 2 tablets, and it seems to work pretty fast.  But for me, sometimes it seems nothing is going to stop my brain. Guess it depends on what other things (like certain B vitamins) are at play.
Not only did it not work at all, it tasted terrible.  The consistency of this product is not user friendly. And too large.  Waste of my money.

These pills have been amazing in my quest for sleep! They are all natural and do not leave me feeling groggy the next day. Not only do I fall asleep more easily, I stay asleep! This is the best price I have seen for these and iHerb had them in stock when they were sold out everywhere else. Highly recommend Banyan and iHerb!

Somewhat helpful in getting back to sleep when I wake in the middle of night, but quite 'gentle'. Will be great if you have very milld insomnia. Energetically, I can feel it's an excellent quality product, just not quite strong enough for me.

review_title: Good to have in your insomnia collection
review_text: This product has a somewhat different ingredient list to many of the other sleep formulas so if you have become used to the others, and they have stopped working, this is a good alternative. It works as well as my other most used sleep potions. Which is to say - I still don't sleep through but I sleep better than if I didn't take it. Quite expensive though.
my first time use of this product, I rate it as effective, really helps falls asleep better and remain asleep longer.  i take 2 depends on the necessity... overall, quite effective
